Thats great Bruce. Easy for me to hear. Did they capture the essence of her voice? Kinda sounds more like your name than "you" for me but everything else I hear the same. I had one sent to my cellphone I posted those over at esnips. This field is full of nteresting stuff =)
   
  Misty

bhali333 <paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
          
hey everybody,

I recieved this at 8:30 AM this morning on my home telephone answering 
machine. I posted it in my main folder in the files section.

It is the third message I have recieved in this fashion in all the 
years I have been involved in the paranormal.

this just gors to show if you don't call them they will call you!

bruce
